activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11982
activity.text:
Hi team 

This PR updates the EncounterQuestion component to make the Discharge Summary Advice textarea a controlled component. It ensures the UI reflects any dynamic changes to encounter.discharge_summary_advice.

1. Also added the discharge_summary_advice field to the EncounterEditRequest type.
2.  Verified the change by logging the value and checking its sync with form state.

Please review and let me know if any further changes are needed!

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11982
activity.text: fix: make discharge summary advice a controlled component
